content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'synapsecosmosomar'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapsecosmosomar]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'U3ebmzWrU0NOL5nuM9ru7nH0NiOmVcxDoR6dmKbklRavhv2gE5kqUjFnfQqL65YwFlm5Vjar81jwACDbFvvWfA=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapsecosmosomar;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapsecosmosomar'
) AS [Heartbeat]
